title: Do you have @Paytm UPI handle? You need to do this before March 15
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is taking steps to ensure smooth digital payments for Paytm UPI users with "@paytm" handles, as Paytm Payments Bank won't accept credits after March 15th, 2024. Here's what's important:
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
